channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged text-mode

item.title: How to make a "continue" hyperlink in a Quest game?
item.description:
I switched from gamebooks to text game and I wanted to basically type in a bunch of stuff, and have a "continue" button which would take them to the start of the game.

Basically, I want to do what this game did

http://play.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=vpf7vh9mfusdg4mta1u76g
